newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Philippines tenders to buy July 180-cst fuel oil.
newsitem.headline: Philippines tenders to buy July 180-cst fuel oil.

text.p: Petron Corp, Philippines' biggest oil refiner has issued a tender to buy 200,000 barrels (27,000 tonnes) of 180-cst fuel oil for July delivery, a company source said on Wednesday.
The tender, which seeks fuel oil with sulphur content of 1.0-1.7 percent for delivery July 6-10, will close on July 13 and is valid on the same day.
In its last purchase, Petron bought 30,000 tonnes of 1.3-percent, 135-cst grade fuel oil for May 17-31 delivery. The awarded price was not disclosed.
